[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@anocca/sequence-viewer-react-shared](./sequence-viewer-react-shared.md) &gt; [SearchComponent](./sequence-viewer-react-shared.searchcomponent.md)



Search component that can be passed to the circular controller.

See: [SearchResult](./sequence-viewer-utils.searchresult.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type SearchComponent = ({ sequence, zoomOnResult, onSearchResults, spinOnResult, isProtein }: {
    sequence: string;
    zoomOnResult: (range: SearchResult) => void;
    spinOnResult: (range: SearchResult) => void;
    onSearchResults: (results: SearchResult[]) => void;
    isProtein: boolean;
}) => JSX.Element;
```
